name: Personal website, Me
description: This website was made in order to present myself and the different projects I made throughout the years.

name: Dev House
short_description: Dev House, your next job awaits you !
description: Dev House is a job platform allowing IT professionals to create job offers, setting these different offers on a map. These offers are displayed using a specific matching algorithm.

name: Kliko
description: Kliko is a local marketplace for city centers, such as Lille's city center. A vendor can register himself to the platform and create products. A customer can click & collect some different products, and he will have a map to go to the different shops.

name: ABB Repository
description: In Enterprise Architecture, an ABB represents the future of a digital product, its target. I created a small repository to help architects creating, updating and deleting their ABBs for the company Adeo.

name: Amazed Mazes
description: I made a small perfect mazes solver in Python, with a graphical interface, to train my programming recursive skills.
